body:
I tried to just do a autoreconf on the contents of the 4.10.2-bsd tarball but
that caused a meltdown due to missing subdirs, etc.  So just insert manually
an updated config.guess.

Useful for detecting aarch64 and latest cray compilers.

I don't have access to older tarballs, so only patch for the two tarballs I can test.

Signed-off-by: Howard Pritchard <hppritcha@gmail.com>
title: silo: add an updated config.guess to configury
